violations.detail: Version should include 'SVML' and version number
'CUSTOM-FIELD' is not an allowed metadata field. Custom metadata fields are strictly prohibited.
violations.suggestion: Use only official fields: MODULES, COPYRIGHT, DOC-VERSION, VERSION, MODEL, DATE, PURPOSE, AUTHOR, DOC. Remove this custom field immediately.

violations.detail: PURPOSE field contains processing pattern syntax (==PATTERN==), which is strictly prohibited
violations.suggestion: Remove all processing pattern syntax from the PURPOSE field. PURPOSE should contain only natural language description.

violations.detail: PURPOSE field contains cognitive mode syntax (%MODE%), which is strictly prohibited
violations.suggestion: Remove all cognitive mode syntax from the PURPOSE field. PURPOSE should contain only natural language description.

violations.detail: Date '25-04-2025' is not in the YYYY-MM-DD format
violations.suggestion: Use the YYYY-MM-DD format for dates (e.g., 2025-04-23)

violations.detail: 'ADVANCED-QUANTUM' is not a recognized processing pattern. Creation of new processing patterns is STRICTLY PROHIBITED.
violations.suggestion: Use ONLY officially defined patterns from the SVML 1.2.2 specification: ADAPTIVE-RESONANCE, ATTENUATION-STABILIZATION, CHAOS, CONSTELLATION, FRACTAL, HIERARCHICAL, HOLOGRAPHIC, HUB-SPOKE, NETWORK-MESH, PARALLEL, QUANTUM, RECURSIVE, REST, SETTLE, SPIRAL, TEMPORAL-CASCADE. For specialized needs, use hybrid patterns combining official patterns with the + operator.

violations.detail: 'LOGICAL' is not a recognized cognitive mode. Creation of new cognitive modes is STRICTLY PROHIBITED.
violations.suggestion: Use ONLY officially defined cognitive modes from the SVML 1.2.2 specification: ANALYTICAL, CREATIVE, CRITICAL, EMPATHETIC, EXPLORATORY, GENERATIVE, INTEGRATIVE, NARRATIVE, PRAGMATIC, REFLECTIVE, SYSTEMS-THINKING. For specialized needs, define custom modes using frame:MetaComposite and %+MODE_NAME+% syntax.

violations.detail: 'attention' is not a valid system parameter
violations.suggestion: Use one of the valid parameters: focus, temp, depth, rest_window, coherence, stability

violations.detail: 'PATTERN' is not a recognized processing pattern. Creation of new processing patterns is STRICTLY PROHIBITED.
violations.suggestion: Use ONLY officially defined patterns from the SVML 1.2.2 specification: ADAPTIVE-RESONANCE, ATTENUATION-STABILIZATION, CHAOS, CONSTELLATION, FRACTAL, HIERARCHICAL, HOLOGRAPHIC, HUB-SPOKE, NETWORK-MESH, PARALLEL, QUANTUM, RECURSIVE, REST, SETTLE, SPIRAL, TEMPORAL-CASCADE. For specialized needs, use hybrid patterns combining official patterns with the + operator.

violations.detail: 'MODE' is not a recognized cognitive mode. Creation of new cognitive modes is STRICTLY PROHIBITED.
violations.suggestion: Use ONLY officially defined cognitive modes from the SVML 1.2.2 specification: ANALYTICAL, CREATIVE, CRITICAL, EMPATHETIC, EXPLORATORY, GENERATIVE, INTEGRATIVE, NARRATIVE, PRAGMATIC, REFLECTIVE, SYSTEMS-THINKING. For specialized needs, define custom modes using frame:MetaComposite and %+MODE_NAME+% syntax.

violations.detail: SETTLE requires a positive integer parameter, got 0
violations.suggestion: Use a positive integer for SETTLE, e.g., SETTLE:3
